summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on April 15, 2024, with a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning cases, including requests for exceptions and variances related to property regulations.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, public testimony, and a review of the minutes from the previous meeting. The main focus will be on the case docket, which consists of uncontested items, holdover cases, and individual cases requiring decisions.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals under consideration include multiple requests for special exceptions to fence height and opacity regulations, as well as variances for side-yard setbacks and floor area ratios. Specific cases include applications for properties located at 1902 Lakeland Drive, 5511 Park Lane, 6242 Walnut Hill Lane, and 310 Canada Drive.

**Action Items**:  
The Board will seek approval for the minutes from the March 18, 2024 meeting and will deliberate on the various zoning requests outlined in the case docket. Decisions on these applications will determine whether the requested exceptions and variances will be granted. Public participation is encouraged, with registration required for those wishing to speak.
